statements: SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Admin';
SELECT policy_name FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description ILIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description IS NOT NULL AND policy_name LIKE 'Access%';
SELECT policy_name, CONCAT('Policy ID: ', policy_id) AS custom_column FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id > 2 ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_category = 'Access Control';
SELECT control_name, control_description FROM security_controls WHERE control_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_category FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_controls WHERE policy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Access%' ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, policy_category FROM security_policies WHERE LENGTH(policy_name) > 10
SELECT policy_name, control_name, control_description FROM security_policies JOIN security_controls ON security_policies.policy_id = security_controls.policy_id

SELECT policy_category, COUNT(*) AS num_controls FROM security_policies JOIN security_controls ON security_policies.policy_id = security_controls.policy_id GROUP BY policy_category ORDER BY num_controls DESC
SELECT DISTINCT policy_category FROM security_policies
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT framework_name, control_name FROM cybersecurity_framework JOIN security_controls ON cybersecurity_framework.control_id = security_controls.control_id;
SELECT framework_name, control_name FROM cybersecurity_framework JOIN security_controls ON cybersecurity_framework.control_id = security_controls.control_id WHERE framework_id = 1;
SELECT control_name, control_desc FROM security_controls WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT framework_name, control_name FROM cybersecurity_framework JOIN security_controls ON cybersecurity_framework.control_id = security_controls.control_id;
SELECT framework_desc, control_desc FROM cybersecurity_framework JOIN security_controls ON cybersecurity_framework.control_id = security_controls.control_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, control_name FROM security_policies JOIN security_controls ON security_policies.policy_id = security_controls.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT * FROM Procedures WHERE procedure_id = 1;
SELECT framework_name, framework_description FROM Framework WHERE framework_id = 2;
SELECT control_name, control_description FROM Controls;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_id > 5;
SELECT framework_name, control_name FROM Framework JOIN Controls ON Framework.framework_id = Controls.control_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM SecurityPolicies GROUP BY policy_id, policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, steps FROM Procedures WHERE steps LIKE '%authentication%';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_role DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_description FROM procedures WHERE control_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, enforcement_method FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT employee_name, access_time, action_taken FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT control_id, control_name FROM security_controls WHERE policy_id = 2 ORDER BY control_id DESC;
SELECT procedures.procedure_name, security_controls.control_name FROM procedures, security_controls WHERE procedures.control_id = security_controls.control_id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role IN ('Admin', 'Manager') ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Login' AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
